title: Global Covid-19 Death Toll Tops Five Million
sub_head: U.S. has highest number of total confirmed deaths, followed by Brazil, India and Mexico, according to Johns Hopkins data
body:
The reported global Covid-19 death toll surpassed five million Monday, according to data compiled by Johns Hopkins University.
The U.S. has the highest number of total confirmed deaths from Covid-19, with nearly 746,000 recorded since the start of the pandemic, according to Johns Hopkins. Brazil, India and Mexico have the next highest reported death tolls.
